toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_bl: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a block.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_en: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an entity.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_li: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a living entity.
Stops the spell from resolving if it targets a player.
item.toomanyglyphs.glyph_filter_living_n: Glyph of Filtering: Living, Not Player
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_li: Stops the spell from resolving if it targets a monster.
item.toomanyglyphs.glyph_filter_living_n: Glyph of Filtering: Living, Not Monster
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_pl: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a player.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_mo: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a monster.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_reverse_d: Reverses the direction of a block-targeted spell across the face struck.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_chaining: Causes a spell to chain through multiple grouped targets, either similar blocks or living entities other than the caster. AOE increases target count. Pierce increases maximum jump distance between targets.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_ray: Instantaneously strikes the pointed-at target, at limited yet greater range than Touch. Mana is expended whether or not the ray hits anything. AOE increases range. Sensitive 1 lets the ray strike objects that do not block motion, such as plants or floating Magelight globes. Sensitive 2 allows the ray to strike fluids.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_it: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a loose item in the world. Likely useless on Projectile and basic Ray, which cannot target non-living entities.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_an: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a farm animal.
toomanyglyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_is: Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets an immature, ageable living creature.
Stops the spell from resolving unless it targets a mature, ageable living creature.
not_enough_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_plow: Simulate the use of an Hoe on blocks.
not_enough_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_trail: Fire a projectile that resolves the spell multiple times on its trail. Add Sensitive to make it resolve on blocks. Use extend time to reduce the delay between each cast and AoE to increase the area of effect.
not_enough_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_propa: Resolves the remainder of the spell into a plane, extending from the block hit. Add Sensitive to make the plane circular. Add Dampen to make the plane hollow.
Convert the remainder of the spell into an Orbit spell, circling around the entity or the block hit. Rules of Orbit apply for augments.
arsomega.glyph_desc.glyph_propagate_proj: Convert the remainder of the spell into a Projectile spell and shoot it from where it resolves.
arsomega.glyph_desc.glyph_propagate_self: Resolves the remainder of the spell on the caster.
arsomega.glyph_desc.glyph_propagate_unde: Resolves the remainder of the spell one block under the position hit.
arsomega.glyph_desc.glyph_flatten: Simulate the use of a Shovel on blocks or deal damage relative to the block underneath the entity.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_homing_pr: This projectile seek the nearest entity and follow it, will behave as a classic projectile while there are no valid targets. Players will only be targeted if augmented by Sensitive.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_propagato: Convert the remainder of the spell into an Homing Projectile and shoot it from where it lands.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_arc_proje: This projectile is affected by gravity. Every Pierce applied will make it bounce one time when it hit the ground.
ars_elemental.glyph_desc.glyph_propagato: Convert the remainder of the spell into an Arc Projectile and shoot it from where it lands.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_summon_focu: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the summoning focus was equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_shaper_focu: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the blockshaping focus was equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_fire_focus: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the fire focus was equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_earth_focus: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the earth focus was equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_water_focus: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the water focus was equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_air_focus: Thread for the spellbinder. Will cast spells as if the air focus was equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_wild_magic: Thread for the spellbinder. Will randomly add positive or negative augments to effects of your spells when equipped.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_cheap_damag: Thread for the spellbinder. Will greatly discount the spells cast from the equipped book but heavily reduce their damage.
ars_nouveau.perk_desc.thread_slow_power: Thread for the spellbinder. Will increase the damage of the spells cast from the equipped book but heavily reduce their speed.
not_enough_glyphs.perk.mana_discount.des: Reduces the mana cost of the spell by %s.
